titleStmt.title: An exposition of the hymne commonly called Benedictus with an ample & comfortable application of the same, to our age and people. By A. Anderson preacher.
titleStmt.author: Anderson, Anthony, d. 1593.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Middleton, for Raufe Newbery,

notesStmt.note: The dedicatory epistle dated: 15. of January. 1573 [ecclesiastical calendar].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
